properties.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 12 at 11:44PM EST by NWS Peachtree City GA
properties.description:
At 1144 PM EST...a strong thunderstorm was over Hilltop, or near
Zebulon...moving northeast at 20 mph.

HAZARD...Up to 40 mph wind...frequent cloud to ground lightning
and heavy rain.

IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of
light...unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary
street flooding especially in poor drainage areas.

Some locations in the path of this storm include
Griffin, Barnesville, Zebulon, Milner, Molena, Williamson, Orchard
Hill, Meansville, Aldora, Gay, East Griffin, Highland Mills,
Experiment, Hilltop, Walker Mill, Lifsey Springs, Hollonville, Rover,
Liberty Hill and Zetella.
properties.instruction:
People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear
thunder...you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists
should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to
hydroplaning.

LAT...LON 3334 8426 3326 8412 3320 8412 3306 8411
3294 8450 3312 8458
TIME...MOT...LOC 0444Z 244DEG 18KT 3309 8445

WIND...40MPH

NWSheadline: SIGNIFICANT WEATHER ADVISORY FOR NORTHWESTERN LAMAR...NORTHWESTERN UPSON...SPALDING...EASTERN MERIWETHER AND PIKE COUNTIES UNTIL 1230 AM EST
